Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to mandating bystander intervention training
Summary: Mandates that all state employees attend bystander intervention training for sexual harassment prevention annually.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to mandating bystander intervention training for sexual harassment prevention for all state employees
